title: Make TiKV GC support configurable thread count
body:
## Development Task
Today TiKV GC thread is hardcoded as 1 and the region gc is done one by one synchronously. 
And in some cases, one round of GC takes a few hours. We need to have a way to speed up the GC by increasing the GC thread. 

![image](https://github.com/tikv/tikv/assets/9442422/edc81296-cf55-49e0-aafa-42ff341617a5)
